data.text: YAAAAAA!!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>YAAAAAA!!!

data.text:
Fine Motion was already quite the natural runner. 
Throughout the spring, and now the summer, we trained to 
steadily improve her innate skills.
data.processed:
<story>Fine Motion was already quite the natural runner. 
<story>Throughout the spring, and now the summer, we trained to 
<story>steadily improve her innate skills.

data.text: Ummm... "Senpai"!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: Ummm... "Senpai"!

data.text:
Thank you for training with me, Senpai♪ 
Running together made it a lot of fun.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Thank you for training with me, Senpai♪ 
<story>Running together made it a lot of fun.

data.text:
Ha... Ha... 
Are you for real...? You're not even a little tired...
data.name: Senpai Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>Ha... Ha... 
<story>Are you for real...? You're not even a little tired...

data.text:
Now, she could go toe-to-toe against a more experienced 
Umamusume with ease. Her growth was truly incredible...

choices.text: (And... she's only going to get better!)
choices.processed: <size=43>(And... she's only going to get better!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>Now, she could go toe-to-toe against a more experienced 
<story>Umamusume with ease. Her growth was truly incredible...

data.text:
Hmm? Are you all right, Trainer? 
Your eyes look a bit teary――
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Are you all right, Trainer? 
<story>Your eyes look a bit teary――

data.text: ――RrrraaaAAAAAHHH！！
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>――RrrraaaAAAAAHHH！！

data.text:
...! 
I know that voice...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...! 
<story>I know that voice...

data.text:
Hahhh... Hahhh....! 
Dammit, still coming up short...!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Hahhh... Hahhh....! 
<story>Dammit, still coming up short...!

data.text:
Tsk. This ain't working out either. 
Then I'll try...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Tsk. This ain't working out either. 
<story>Then I'll try...

data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>......No.

data.text:
You know, I love watching Shakur whenever she's deep in 
thought.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>You know, I love watching Shakur whenever she's deep in 
<story>thought.

data.text: Most of the time she notices and gets mad, though!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Most of the time she notices and gets mad, though!

data.text:
.....Can we move on to the next part of training? 
I want to work as hard as she does!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Sure, but let's take a break first.

data.processed:
<story>.....Can we move on to the next part of training? 
<story>I want to work as hard as she does!

data.text:
――Oh, there she is! 
Your Highness Fine Motion!
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>――Oh, there she is! 
<story>Your Highness Fine Motion!

data.text: Oh, who may you be...?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Oh, who may you be...?

data.text:
Oh, y'know, just some reporter! You're all anyone's talking about 
these days, see! You're even the super, duper, duper, duper 
favorite to win!
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>Oh, y'know, just some reporter! You're all anyone's talking about 
<story>these days, see! You're even the super, duper, duper, duper 
<story>favorite to win!

data.text:
My, I'm honored. 
Thank you very much.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>My, I'm honored. 
<story>Thank you very much.

data.text:
Well, don't thank me, y'know~. But, uh, heheh, you're strong, 
and beautiful, and to top it all off, your running 
just brings a smile to our faces!
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>Well, don't thank me, y'know~. But, uh, heheh, you're strong, 
<story>and beautiful, and to top it all off, your running 
<story>just brings a smile to our faces!

data.text:
You're just amazing, Your Highness! 
So, well, y'know? Can we get a pictu――
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>You're just amazing, Your Highness! 
<story>So, well, y'know? Can we get a pictu――

data.text:
――Pardon the interruption, but these inquiries should be made 
through the proper channels with the academy.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>――Pardon the interruption, but these inquiries should be made 
<story>through the proper channels with the academy.

data.text:
Oh! You must be the bodyguard! 
I think you'd make a real pretty picture, so mind if I take a 
snapshot?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>Oh! You must be the bodyguard! 
<story>I think you'd make a real pretty picture, so mind if I take a 
<story>snapshot?

data.text:
H- hey, don't go around getting pictures behind our backs! 
Let us get in on this!
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>H- hey, don't go around getting pictures behind our backs! 
<story>Let us get in on this!

data.text:
I'm with the station! We can go live any time, so do you think 
we can get an interview!?
data.name: Reporter C
data.processed:
<story>I'm with the station! We can go live any time, so do you think 
<story>we can get an interview!?

data.text:
Oh, dear, just look at this crowd... 
I really am the favorite to win~
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Can we get out of here first!?
Can we get out of here first!?

data.processed:
<story>Oh, dear, just look at this crowd... 
<story>I really am the favorite to win~

data.text:
A crowd had formed while we were standing around. It was 
holding up the training camp. For all the Umamusume here, 
but especially for Fine, I wanted to escape quickly and safely.

choices.text: We'll need to "force" our way out...
Let's talk our way out of this!

data.processed:
<story>A crowd had formed while we were standing around. It was 
<story>holding up the training camp. For all the Umamusume here, 
<story>but especially for Fine, I wanted to escape quickly and safely.

data.text: If it's come to this...
data.processed: <story>If it's come to this...

data.text:
Understood. 
I'll escort the two of you in.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Understood. 
<story>I'll escort the two of you in.

data.text:
Okay! 
Well, everyone, it's been a pleasure. 
Let's meet in a more formal setting next time.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Okay! 
<story>Well, everyone, it's been a pleasure. 
<story>Let's meet in a more formal setting next time.

data.text: Ahhh, Your Highness~!
data.name: The Reporters
data.processed: <story>Ahhh, Your Highness~!

data.text: ...Heehee.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>...Heehee.

data.text:
You said "force our way out" out of nowhere, so I almost thought 
you were going to start fighting everyone there.
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Sorry. That was pretty pathetic of me.

data.processed:
<story>You said "force our way out" out of nowhere, so I almost thought 
<story>you were going to start fighting everyone there.

data.text:
But, if I tried to get us out of there without a clue what I was 
doing, there's a real possibility I would only make things worse. 
Pathetic as it was, the best option was leave it to a professional.
data.processed:
<story>But, if I tried to get us out of there without a clue what I was 
<story>doing, there's a real possibility I would only make things worse. 
<story>Pathetic as it was, the best option was leave it to a professional.

data.text:
I don't think you were pathetic at all. 
You made the right call.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I don't think you were pathetic at all. 
<story>You made the right call.

data.text:
If you make a call like that, I know I can count on you. 
It reminded me just how happy I am to be with you. Heehee.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>If you make a call like that, I know I can count on you. 
<story>It reminded me just how happy I am to be with you. Heehee.
